nodes.text: Fruit fizz was a fruity beverage served by bartenders in cantinas across the galaxy.
Fruit fizz had a brownish coloration.

Fruit fizz appeared in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts. The game was shut down on December 15, 2011. In the game, fruit fizz could be purchased from bartenders in cantinas around the galaxy. It should be noted that the same graphical model for fruit fizz was used for other items in the game, such as Jawa beer.
